service.service_embed: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="{w}" height="{h}" data="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf"> <param name="flashvars" value="page_show_url=/photos/{serviceVAL}/sets/{serviceVAL2}/show/&set_id={serviceVAL2}&offsite=true"> <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"> <param name="allownetworking" value="all" /> </object>
